languages.text: {n}В полумраке палат, едва освещенная мерцающими огнями свечей, я становлюсь подобна им. Заблудшим, погрязшим в грязи серфам. Они станут непреднамеренными союзниками моей охоты. Их безысходность, отчаяние, жажду выжить я использую как инструмент.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В полумраке палат, едва освещенная мерцающими огнями свечей и лучами сирен, я становлюсь подобна им. Заблудшим, погрязшим в грязи сервам. Все они станут непреднамеренными союзниками моей охоты. Их безысходность, их отчаяние, их жажду выжить я использую как инструмент.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them — the lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become tools for my use.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В полумраке палат, едва освещенная мерцающими огнями свечей, я становлюсь подобна им. Заблудшим, погрязшим в грязи серфам. Они станут непреднамеренными союзниками моей охоты. Их безысходность, отчаяние, жажду выжить я использую как инструмент.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them. The lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become the tools I can use.{/n}

{n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them. The lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become the tools I can use.{/n}

{n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them — the lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become tools for my use.{/n}

{n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them — the lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become tools for my use.{/n}

{n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them — the lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become tools for my use.{/n}

{n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them — the lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become tools for my use.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Im Zwielicht der Dämmerung, kaum erhellt von flackerndem Kerzenschein, werde ich wie sie — wie die verlorenen, gelähmten Diener. Sie werden zu unwissentlichen Verbündeten meiner Jagd. Ihre Hoffnungslosigkeit, ihre Verzweiflung, ihr Durst nach Überleben werden zu meinen Werkzeugen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them — the lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become tools for my use.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Im Zwielicht der Dämmerung, kaum erhellt von flackerndem Kerzenschein, werde ich wie sie — wie die verlorenen, gelähmten Diener. Sie werden zu unwissentlichen Verbündeten meiner Jagd. Ihre Hoffnungslosigkeit, ihre Verzweiflung, ihr Durst nach Überleben werden zu meinen Werkzeugen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En el crepúsculo de la cámara, apenas iluminada por velas titilantes, me vuelvo como ellos, los sirvientes perdidos y confusos. Serán mis aliados en esta caza sin saberlo. Su desesperanza, su desesperación y su ansia de supervivencia serán mis herramientas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them — the lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become tools for my use.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En el crepúsculo de la cámara, apenas iluminada por velas titilantes, me vuelvo como ellos, los sirvientes perdidos y confusos. Serán mis aliados en esta caza sin saberlo. Su desesperanza, su desesperación y su ansia de supervivencia serán mis herramientas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}部屋の夕闇の中、揺らめく蠟燭の明かりでかろうじて照らされている中で、私は彼らのように…迷い、泥にまみれた下僕になる。彼らは私の狩りで無意識の同盟者となる。その失意、自暴自棄、生存への渇望は、私が使う道具となる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them — the lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become tools for my use.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}部屋の夕闇の中、揺らめく蠟燭の明かりでかろうじて照らされている中で、私は彼らのように…迷い、泥にまみれた下僕になる。彼らは私の狩りで無意識の同盟者となる。その失意、自暴自棄、生存への渇望は、私が使う道具となる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}房间非常昏暗，摇曳的烛光几乎无法带来任何光明。在黑暗之中，我成为了他们之中的一员。我化身为陷入困境的迷失仆从，而他们会在不知不觉中成为我的盟友。他们的无助、绝望、对生存的渴望，将会成为我手中的工具。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them — the lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become tools for my use.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}房间非常昏暗，摇曳的烛光几乎无法带来任何光明。在黑暗之中，我成为了他们之中的一员。我化身为陷入困境的迷失仆从，而他们会在不知不觉中成为我的盟友。他们的无助、绝望、对生存的渴望，将会成为我手中的工具。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans la pénombre de la chambre, à peine éclairée par la lumière vacillante des bougies, je deviens comme eux, pauvres serviteurs perdus et embrouillés. Ils deviendront des alliés involontaires dans ma chasse. Je me servirai de leur désespoir et de leur envie de survivre comme d'outils pour parvenir à mes fins.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them — the lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become tools for my use.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans la pénombre de la chambre, à peine éclairée par la lumière vacillante des bougies, je deviens comme eux, pauvres serviteurs perdus et embrouillés. Ils deviendront des alliés involontaires dans ma chasse. Je me servirai de leur désespoir et de leur envie de survivre comme d'outils pour parvenir à mes fins.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Titreşen mum ışığıyla güç bela aydınlanan odanın loşluğunda onlardan birine dönüşüyorum. Kaybolmuş, dertlerle cebelleşen bir hizmetkârım. Avımda bana istem dışı müttefiklik yapacaklar. Umutsuzlukları, çaresizlikleri ve hayatta kalma arzuları; kullanabileceğim araçlar olacak.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In the twilight of the chamber, barely illuminated by flickering candlelight, I become like them — the lost, mired servants. They will become unwitting allies in my hunt. Their hopelessness, their desperation, their thirst for survival will become tools for my use.{/n}
